channel.title: Few errors running the divinepk source
channel.description:
I have put the www folder in wamp\www. Went to phpmyadmin and loaded demonik_lsd.sql. Now then when i go to register a character, i get the error 'forum_id' doesnt exist. Not only that, I have went into the run.bat changed all the details it now looks like this, set PATH=%PATH%;C:\apache\bin set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program\Java\jdk1.6.0_06 ant demonikp2p
My compilers also contains, @echo off set PATH=%PATH%;C:\apache\bin set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program\Java\jdk1.6.0_06 ant -buildfile .\build.xml cls ant pause.
When i go to compile it just comes up for about 2 secs, says build succefull and then closes. When i go to run it does the same thing just with more stuff in it. Don't flame me that much pl0x. All help is appreciated.

item.title: Few errors running the divinepk source

item.title: Few errors running the divinepk source
item.dc:creator: @auroa auroa
item.description:
@auroa wrote:

I have put the www folder in wamp\www. Went to phpmyadmin and loaded demonik_lsd.sql. Now then when i go to register a character, i get the error ‘forum_id’ doesnt exist. Not only that, I have went into the run.bat changed all the details it now looks like this, set
PATH=%PATH%;C:\apache\bin
set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program\Java\jdk1.6.0_06
ant demonikp2p

My compilers also contains,
@echo off
set PATH=%PATH%;C:\apache\bin
set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program\Java\jdk1.6.0_06
ant -buildfile .\build.xml
cls
ant
pause.

When i go to compile it just comes up for about 2 secs, says build succefull and then closes. When i go to run it does the same thing just with more stuff in it. Don’t flame me that much pl0x. All help is appreciated.

Read full topic
